user.title: Autodoctor
user.description: Set up automation validation to detect state-related issues.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.

error.warmup_exceeds_baseline: Runtime warmup samples cannot exceed runtime baseline days.
error.baseline_too_short_for_training: Runtime baseline days must be larger than the internal cold-start window to produce anomaly training rows.

data_description.history_days: Number of days of state history to analyze
data_description.validate_on_reload: Run validation automatically whenever automations are reloaded
data_description.debounce_seconds: Wait this many seconds after reload before validating (prevents multiple rapid validations)
data_description.periodic_scan_interval_hours: Run a background validation scan every N hours and publish issues to Repairs
data_description.strict_template_validation: Flag template expressions that reference undefined variables or use risky patterns
data_description.strict_service_validation: Flag service calls with unrecognized target fields or missing required parameters
data_description.runtime_health_enabled: Track automation trigger behavior over time and detect runtime anomalies
data_description.runtime_health_baseline_days: Days of recorder history used to build runtime behavior baseline
data_description.runtime_health_warmup_samples: Minimum active baseline days needed before ML anomaly detection starts
data_description.runtime_health_min_expected_events: Minimum expected daily trigger count before anomaly scoring starts
data_description.runtime_health_hour_ratio_days: Days used to compute current-hour activity ratio against historical same-hour behavior
data_description.runtime_health_sensitivity: Sensitivity profile for count anomaly confidence intervals (low, medium, high)
data_description.runtime_health_burst_multiplier: Multiplier over learned 5-minute baseline rate required to classify a burst
data_description.runtime_health_max_alerts_per_day: Maximum runtime alerts emitted per automation per day
data_description.runtime_health_restart_exclusion_minutes: Minutes to suppress runtime scoring after startup/restart

validate.name: Validate Automations
validate.description: Run validation on all automations or a specific one.

automation_id.name: Automation ID
automation_id.description: Optional: specific automation to validate. Leave empty to validate all.

validate_automation.name: Validate Specific Automation
validate_automation.description: Run validation on a specific automation.

refresh_knowledge_base.name: Refresh Knowledge Base
refresh_knowledge_base.description: Rebuild the state knowledge base from recorder history and entity schemas.
